title: Construction of honey bee hives like CuO/PbO heterojunction photocatalysts with enhanced antibiotic and dye degradation activity under visible light
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00270A, Paper
Karina Bano, Prit Pal Singh, Sandeep Kumar, Shakir Saeed, Saurabh Aggarwal, Ranvijay Singh, Sandeep Kaushal
The effective removal of harmful water pollutants was achieved with the help of hydrothermally synthesized visible light-activated CuO/PbO heterojunction material. Using a variety of advanced methods, the composition, morphological and...
